txt.en: Ingold can be found at the northern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'Considering the impending battle, this is a good day for Gondor, if ever there were a good day in these dark times.'
Jal Vârsha: Taking the North Wall
Jal Vârsha can be found along the northern Rammas in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should burn enemy banners and plant banners of Gondor throughout the encampment.

'Let us show the Sûhalar that they are no match for Gondor!

'Go to their encampment against the northern Rammas, destroy their banners, and place banners of Gondor throughout their camp!

'Let the flag of Gondor strike them with fear.'
The Sûhalar Easterlings have constructed an encampment at the base of the northern Rammas. Ingold believes that the presence of Gondor along the wall may drive the enemy away.
